article: thousands of taxi drivers in the italian capital kept their cabs parked thursday , leaving romans and tourists alike waiting in vain under a scorching sun as the latest of a series of transport strikes disrupted travel .
abstract: cab drivers stage strike in rome to demand city create more taxi
